content:
This code chunk is part of a method that initializes a UI component (likely a radio button or checkbox) with specific visual properties. The chunk sets up the geometry, scale, color, state, text, and relief of the component, which are common parameters for defining the appearance and behavior of graphical user interface elements in a 3D application framework like Panda3D.

geom = self['boxGeom'],
                                              geom_scale = self['boxGeomScale'],
                                              geom_color = self['boxGeomColor'],
                                              state = 'disabled',
                                              text = ('X', 'X'),
                                              relief = self['boxRelief'],
                                              )
